Akira

Rank: 553


A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a teenage biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by his best friend.


Director: Katsuhiro Ôtomo

Writer: Katsuhiro Ôtomo, Izô Hashimoto

Stars: Mitsuo Iwata, Nozomu Sasaki, Mami Koyama

Tags: Action Epic, Adult Animation, Anime, Cyberpunk, Dark Fantasy, Dystopian Sci,Fi, Epic, Fantasy Epic, Hand,Drawn Animation, Political Drama
